titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for retirement savings for individuals who are active participants in other retirement plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code that limit the deductibility of contributions to individual retirement plans by active participants in employer-maintained retirement plans.
